hero.title: Kichwa Karanki Runakuna
hero.subtitle: 칌awpa taytakuna Ecuador jawa urkupi - Imbabura markapi

features.sectionSubtitle: Taripay 침awpa kawsay kimsa hatun kaq

culture.title: Kawsay Yachay
culture.description: 칌awpa churanakuna makiwan awaska, makiwan ruraska ruraykunawan 침ukanchik kikin kay rikuchin

traditions.title: 칌awpa Raymikuna
traditions.description: Inti Raymi, Kulla Raymi, Paukar Raymi: raymikuna pacha kawsaywan tantakushka

about.title: 쯇ikuna Kanchik?
about.description: Kichwa Karanki runakuna 침awpa kawsay Ecuador jawa urkupi, Imbabura markapi. Caranqui, Cayambe, Otavalo hatun ayllumanta shamushka, 침ukanchik kikin kayta 침awpa tarpuy ruraykunawan, 침awpa raymikunawan, Pacha Mama kawsaywan tantakushka wankachikunchik.

location.title: 칌ukanchik Allpa
location.subtitle: Ecuador Uraykuna Jawa
location.description: 칌ukanchik yachay ayllu kawsaykuna mast'arikun sumaq markakuna Ibarra, Otavalo, Antonio Ante, Pimampiro nisqapi Imbabura suyupi, sumaq urqukuna, puquq urqukuna, hatun yachay kawsaywan.
location.ibarra: Ibarra: La Esperanza, Angochagua, Caranqui, San Antonio
location.pimampiro: Pimampiro: Mariano Acosta, San Francisco de Sigsipamba

territoryCta.title: Taripay 칌ukanchik Raymi
territoryCta.description: Yachay Inti Raymi, Kulla Raymi, Pawkar Raymi ima raymi 침awpamanta kay kawsayta 침awpaq kayta waqaychaspa

culture.title: Kawsay Yachay
culture.subtitle: 칌ukanchik runakuna kikin kay sapa churana makiwan ruraskapi

hero.vestimentaDesc: Sapa churana willakun huk willakuyta kikin kaymanta, 침awpa yachaymanta, miray miraypi chuysasqa kuyaywan respetowanpas

menCard.title: Kari Churana
menCard.description: Poncho, yurak pantalon, alpargatas, uchilla sombrero

womenCard.title: Warmi Churana
womenCard.description: Blusa awaska, anaco, walka, lulu chalina

sections.elementsDesc: Sapa churana ima hatun yachayniyuq, allpawan, 침awpa runakunawan tantakuy
sections.craftsDesc: Karanki 침awpa yachay rikukun awaskakunapi, 침awpa yachaywan ruraska

clothing.sectionDescription: Sapa churana hatun yuyayta charin, 침ukanchik allpakunawan 침awpa taytakunawan tantanakuyta rikuchin

men.title: Kari Churana
men.description: Karanki karikuna yurak pantalonwan yurak camisawan churanakun, puka millma ponchowan raymi pachapak, ankas poncho sapa puncha churanakuna. Yurak alpargataswan, uchilla sombrero churikun.

women.title: Warmi Churana
women.description: Warmikuna yurak blusa achka lulupi awaska churanakun kunka pichka chayashpa. Ankas o yana anaco churikun cinturapi fajawan watashka. Kunkapi walka (kuri wallka) churikun, makipi manilakuna (puka coral pulseras). Yana sombrero, yana alpargatas, sumak lulu chalinawan tukuchin.

language.title: Kichwa Shimi
language.subtitle: 칌awpa taytakunapa kunka
language.description: Kichwa Karanki runakunapa hatun shimi, castellano iskay kaq shimi. 칌awpaka, Karanki runakuna Barbacoan shimita rimakarka, chayka Inka pachapi kichwaman tikrakarka.
language.statusDescription: Kunanka mana alli yuyaykuna kichwa shimita chayamun, mana allilla kamachikuna chaypi kaskamanta.
language.revitalizationDescription: MOSEIB (Modelo de Educaci칩n Intercultural Biling칲e) ruraykanchik kikin kayta wankachinkapak, yachakukkunapa kichwa yachayta kallpachinkapak.

embroidery.title: Makiwan Awaska
embroidery.description: Makiwan awaska 침awpamantarak hatun ruraymi karka. Camisakuna ancha sumak, achka lulun awaska yurak pacha awaska maytuka sumakta awashka. Karanki warmikunapa awaskakuna tukuy pachaman rishka, Ecuador ukupi, tukuy pachapi feriaspi.

beadwork.title: Mulluwam Ruraska
beadwork.description: Ruku warmikuna uchilla puka mullukuna hilowan tantachin manilakunata ruranakapak, chaykunata warmikuna churanakun.

tablecloths.title: Manteles Awaska
tablecloths.description: Manteles awaskakuna millma hiloswan, achka lulun, polyester pacha, encajes, lienzo, agujas, vitela moldewan rurashka.

organization.title: Tantachiy Rurashka
organization.subtitle: Kichwa Karanki runakuna ayllukunapi, comunakunapi kawsan, hatun kamachik Cabildo Tantachiy
organization.description: Kichwa Karanki runakuna ayllukunapi, comunakunapi kawsan, hatun kamachik Cabildo Tantachiy. Ayllukuna corporacionespi, parroquial tantanakuykunapi tantachishka, chaymanta federacionespi tantachishka.

cabildo.title: Cabildo Tantachiy
cabildo.description: Sapa wata, Cabildo Tantachiy shuk yuyayta ruran Asambleaman churanakapak. Rurashkakuna hatun tantakuykunapi yuyashka, chaypika tukuy yuyaykuna kawsay wi침achinakapak yuyashka.

elders.title: Ruku Taytakunapa Tantachiy
elders.description: Ruku Taytakunapa Tantachiy kachun yachaywan yanapanakapak, shuwa, pandilla, allpa llakikuna, auki llakikuna allichinkapak.

minga.title: Minga
minga.description: Minga (minkay) kawsay ruraymi chaypika tukuy runakuna Cabildowan tukuykunapak allinta rurankuna: 침ankuna alliyachiy, ayllu wasi rikuy, tantanakakunata rurashka. Minga tantay llankaymi chaypika tukuykuna kushikunawan.
minga.principle: Tantay llankay reciprocidad, yanapanakuy, ayllupak yanapanakuy ruraymanta.
minga.activities: 칌ankuna alliyachiy, ayllu wasi rikuy, ayllu rurashka wasi, tarpuy llankay tantay.

agriculture.title: Tarpuy
agriculture.description: Hatun rurashka tarpuypa. Urku jatunkunapi chiri pacha mikuykunata tarpunkuna: trigu, cebada, papa, uka; urakunapi sarataranku kitipikunaman apichinakapak.

livestock.title: Uywakuna Rikuy
livestock.description: Wakakuna, kuchikuna, uwija, atallpakuna uywankuna mikuypak, wakinkuna rantichipika. Leche rantiy ancha qullqita karachimun.

tourism.title: Ayllu Turismo
tourism.description: Mushuk qullqi rishka turismo comunitario, chaypika yachaykunata Ecuador ukumanta, hawa pachata rikukkunaman rikuchin.
tourism.example: La Magdalena ayllu mikuy allinta kunan, agroturismo, caballopi purinakunata ruran.

barter.title: Trueque
barter.description: Karanki runakuna 침awpa rantiy truequeta mushukyachin, urku mikuykunata pampa mikuykunawan rantichishpa, kawsay 침awpakunata kallpachin.

traditions.title: 칌awpa Yachay
traditions.subtitle: Raymikuna allpa pachawan, pacha ukuwan tantakuchin

festivals.title: Hatun Raymikuna
festivals.subtitle: 칌awpa raymikuna inti pachakuna, tarpuy pachakuna rikuchinka

inti.name: Inti Raymi
inti.description: Hatun 침awpa raymimi, pichka pachak watakunamanta wankachishka. Karanki runakuna Intita yupayankuna, pallaykunamanta kushikushpa: sara, purutu, chuchu, awas, zapallo, papa, murukuna.
inti.locations: Caranqui parroquia, Yaguarcocha Tabl칩n Tolas, Atahualpa 침an, Zuleta, San Clemente, Turupamba, Rumipamba, Mariano Acosta, Pimampiro

kulla.name: Kulla Raymi
kulla.description: Pacha Mamata yupayamun tukuy wata kushkamanta, allpata mushuk murukunata chaskichunkapak allichishpami. Warmi raymipa chawpinmi. Kunilla 21 mushuk tarpuy kallarina: sara, purutu, pepinu, wakinkunata tarpukuna.

pawkar.name: Paukar Raymi
pawkar.description: Inti killa takinapi, imaymana ruraykunawan, raymikuna Karanki runakuna Paukar Raymita rayminkuna. Pacha Mamata yupayankuna 침awpak llullu mikuykunata pallay atishkamanta.

inti.title: Inti Raymi Ruray
inti.description: Ayllu plazapi rurashka Pacha Mamata yupay pallaykunamanta, shuk chakana awawan, sisakunawan, rurukunawan, murukunawan. Ayllu pushakkuna, Yachak, wawakuna, 침ustakuna tantanakunkuna.

pachamanca.title: Pachamanca
pachamanca.description: Tukuy mikuykunata allpa ukupi kushka rumikuna kunkawan yanushka, paykunapa hawanpika Inti Raymi takiwan tushunkuna yanukuna tukushkanman.

baston.title: Bast칩n de Mando Kuykuna
baston.description: Chusku yaku, wayra, nina, pachawan allinta kawsanakapak rurashka, mushuk muyupa allinta kallarinkapak sumak yuyaykunawan.

marriage.title: Karanki Kasarakuy
marriage.description: Rurashkakunaka: novio taytakunapa makiwan ma침akuy, 'gashto' (t'anta, rurukuna, kuyes, atallpa, upyaykuna waykuna) novia ayllukunaman kuykuna, viernes punchapi kamachikpa kasarakuy, s치bado novia llukshiy shuk uwija suegrawan, raymi religioso, domingo 'chaki y maki mayllay' (chakikuna makikuna mayllay) padrinokunapamanta.
marriage.sirvicha: Pacha novio sumak kay rikuchinka novia ayllukunata yanapashpa
marriage.music: 칌awpa takiy guitarra, bombos, flautas, bandolinas, violinwan

wasi.title: Wasi Pichay
wasi.description: Wasi rurashka tukuptiqa raymikun wasi tukushkamanta. Runakuna medianokunawan (kuykuna), wakin churanakunawan tantanakunkuna.

instruments.title: 칌awpa Takina Imanakuna
instruments.description: Karanki runakuna 침awpa takina imanakuna takinkuna sanjuanitos ruranakapak. Kasarakuy raymikunapi 침awpa takiy ruray tantakushka.

contemporary.title: Kunan Pacha Rurashka
contemporary.kipiku: Kipiku yachay takiy: chunka shuk wawakuna shuk disco grabashka paykuna rurashka takina imankunawan
contemporary.amaru: Amaru Tantanakuy: kikin kay takikunata ruran Kichwa Karanki runakuna yachaykunata wilachinakapak

dance.title: Tushuy
dance.description: Warmikuna yachaykunata yachachin copla tushuywan. Inti Raymipika 'zapateo' 침awpa ruray wankachikun folkl칩rico tantanakuykunawan, tushakkunawan, 침ustakunawan, ayllu runakunawan.

hero.title: Karanki Rikuy
hero.subtitle: 칌ukanchik sagradu tantanakuy kawsay pacha pachakunawan
hero.description: 칌ukanchik andino rikuypi, tukuy tantanakushka: janaj pacha, kay pacha, yaku, nina. Pacha Mama 침ukanchikta pushin, amachin, yachachin tukuy kawsakkunawan tantalla kawsayta: Inti Pacha (janaj pacha), Kay Pacha (kunan pacha), Uku Pacha (ukupi pacha).

pachamama.title: Pacha Mama - Mama Allpa
pachamama.subtitle: Tukuy kawsay, 침awpa yachay pukyu
pachamama.intro: Mama Allpa 침ukanchik kawsaymanta chawpi. Payka 침ukanchikta mikuchin, amachin, yachachin. Paykunaman yupaychanchik murukunamanta, ma침akunchik ukun murukunata chaskikunata wi침achinapaj.

sacred.title: Sagradu Kitikuna
sacred.description: Karanki runakuna hatun urkukunata sagradu urku kashkata adoraran, Kay Pacha Inti Pachawan tuparin.

cosmovision.title: Karanki Pacha Yachay
cosmovision.subtitle: 칌ukanchik sumak tantakuy Pacha Mamaawan, pacha ukuwan

pachaMama.title: Pacha Mama
pachaMama.description: Allpa Mama chawpin 침ukanchik pacha yachaypi. Yupayankuna pallaykunamanta, ma침ankuna uksanpi mushuk murukunata chaskichunkapak. Karanki runakuna hatun urkunata yupayakakarka sumak urkukuna shina.

elements.title: Chusku Yachay
elements.description: Chusku yachay tantachikun: yaku, wayra, nina, pacha, mana chaykunawan kawsay kanmanchu.

astral.title: Pacha Hawamanta Willakuna
astral.sun: Inti kuychi watarishka mana alli pacha pallay pachapi shamushkamanta
astral.moon: Killa kuychi watarishka ayllu llaki o ayllu wa침uy wilamun
astral.rainbow: Kuychi rikurishka tamyakuna tukukushkanmanta, rupay pacha chayankapak

animals.title: Uywakunapa Willakuna
animals.dogs: Allu shunku kayta, allpata aspiy shuk ayllu runapa wa침uyninta shuk killakamanta
animals.condor: Kuntur phaway: sapalla phawan, wa침uy willakuy; ishkaylla phawan, kasarakuy willakuy
animals.owl: Kuskunku wakayashka wa침uyta willakun: tutamantallaqa karulla; chisi o tuta karulla mana

nature.title: Pacha Mama I침iy
nature.puruhanta: Puruhanta kucha shunku uyarishka Angochaguapi hatun tamya shamushkanta willan

midwifery.title: Wawakuna Llukchichiy
midwifery.description: Warmikuna hampikkuna ancha sumakta yanapankuna. Cebolla sapi, melluco imakunawan menjurjes rurankuna wawa llukshichunkapak, cuello uterino jatuchunkapak.

limpia.title: Mana Alli Wayra Pichay
limpia.description: Mana alli kallpakuna yaku wasi, pukyu, kucha, wayku ukumanta llukchichunkapak rurashka, chilca, ruda, kuy, runtu, aguardiente, tabacuwan.

espanto.title: Mancharishkata Jatariychiy
espanto.description: Wawakuna mancharikunamanta hampiy urmashkamanta, uywakunamanta, 'Shungu, Shungu' (animuta jatarichiy) rurashpa chilca, t'ikakuna, ma침akuna, allpa takiykunawan.

list.name: Urtica
list.use: Pichay, aycha chiri, kalambre, uma chupa

list.name: Juyanguilla
list.use: Uma nanay, ushkay, mana alli wayra

origins.title: 칌awpamanta Pachakuna
origins.description: Karanki o Cara runakuna hatun yachay pacha yachay tantachiypi rurashka. Pir치mide truncashka escalashkakunata cangagua o toba volc치nicawan rurashka, ecuador chimpapi churashka.
origins.pyramids: Pir치mide kitikunapi: Cochasqu칤, Cayambe, Caranqui (Zuleta hacienda), Perugachi, Gualim치n

inca.title: Inka Chaskishka
inca.description: XV pachak wata tukuypika, Karanki runakuna Kullasuyu runakuna chayamushkata rikunkuna (Inka). Chaskishka XVI pachak wata kallaripika Yaguarcocha maqanakuywan tukurin (yawar kucha).

colonial.title: Colonial Republikano Pachakuna
colonial.description: Colonizaci칩n republikano pachapi, Karanki runakuna allpa kawsay suwarishka. 칌usta Kilazo, Benjam칤n 칌uca pushakkunapa maqanakuyka kay runkunata derechokuna ma침achimusha.

contemporary.title: Kunan Pachakuna
contemporary.constitution1998: 1998 Constituci칩n 침awpak kutita runakunapa derechos colectivos allpa 침awpakunapi rikuchin
contemporary.constitution2008: 2008 Constituci칩n, 57 art칤culo, Derechos Colectivos rikuchin, 침awpa rantiy truequeta mushukyachishpa kikin kayta kallpachinkapak yanapashpa

gallery.title: Kawsay Rikuna Wasi
gallery.subtitle: 칌ukanchik runakuna, allpakuna, 침awpa yachay rikuykuna

mountains.title: Sagradu Urkukuna
mountains.description: 칌ukanchik 침awpa llaktata muyurishka Andes urkukuna

fields.title: Tarpuy Allpakuna
fields.description: Miray allpakuna maypitaj 침awpa mikhunata tarpunchik

textiles.title: 칌awpa Away
textiles.description: Makiwan sagradu unanchawan churashka 침awpa churanakuna

info.title: Willakuy
info.communities: 42 ayllukuna Ibarra, Otavalo, Antonio Ante, Pimampiro kitikunapi

q1.question: 쯂aranki ayllukunaman wataykuna atinichu?
q1.answer: Ari, wakin ayllukuna La Magdalena shina turismo comunitario kunan. 칌ukanchik kawsay, mikuykuna, agroturismo, caballopi purinakunata shamuy. Rimanakuy sumakta watakunata yuyachinakapak.

q2.question: 쯀maynatataq Karanki runakunata yanapankiman?
q2.answer: Yanapankiman 침ukanchik makiwan awashka rantichiypika, turismo comunitariopi tantanakaypika, kichwa shimi mushukyachiy yachakuna tantanakaypika.

q3.question: 쯀ma raymikunatataq rikuykuna atini?
q3.answer: Hatun raymikuna Inti Raymi (Inti killa 21), Kulla Raymi (Kunilla killa), Paukar Raymi (Pawkar killa 21). 칌awpa raymikuna allita rikukkunapak kaskakuna.

q4.question: 쯂ichwa shimita yachachinkuchu?
q4.answer: Ari, MOSEIB (Modelo de Educaci칩n Intercultural Biling칲e) 침ukanchik ayllukunapi ruranchik. Kichwa shimi yachana tallerkunatapash ruranchik kikin kayta wankachinkapak.

footer.description: Kichwa Karanki Runakuna - Pichka pachak watakunamanta 침awpa kawsayta wankachishpa Imbabura chawpipi, Ecuador.
footer.cantons: Kantunkuna: Ibarra, Otavalo, Antonio Ante, Pimampiro
footer.missionText: 칌awpa Karanki kulturata wankachina, kallpachana, tantachina, Pacha Mamata yupaychakushpa, yayayakunapa yachaykunata kasukushpa.
footer.rights: Kichwa Karanki Runakuna. Tukuy derecho wankachishka.
